description: Are you getting tired of sexy hot new faces at Hogtied yet? I'm not. Smokie Flame is smoken hot. This natural beauty is like the girl next-door, so innocent looking, but so bad. We put Smokie into some great bondage ties; she got off on being helpless, and begged to do it again. She looks so good with a ball gag deep in her mouth! Don't worry this one will be back!
title: Smokie Flame
